Html:
Is there a way to change the background color on the screen, and/or the detached LCD?

In particular, I'd like to be able to choose a white background with a black foreground for more contrast. As a math teacher, I would find this invaluable because I like to use Wabbit on the projector. I also sometimes put screenshots in documents and the dark gray foreground on a light gray background doesn't work well in print.
